content: Added a new leaderboard system showcasing top-ranked users globally.
Introduced dark mode customization with new theme options.
Now you can share your stunt scooter achievements directly to social media.
Enhanced chat performance with faster message delivery.
Optimized friend request system for quicker responses.
Updated user profile interface for a cleaner look.
Resolved issues causing occasional app crashes when viewing profiles.
Fixed notification badge not updating properly after reading messages.
Corrected ranking calculations to ensure fair user placements.
Introducing in-app events with exclusive rewards.
New trick tutorials section for beginners and pros alike.
